titles.title: A bill for the relief of Paulette Mendes-Silva.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-366.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Recommitted by House to House Committee on The Judiciary by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia to hear, determine, and render judgment on any claim of a named individual against the United States for personal injuries allegedly resulting from the administration of an inoculation.
